item.title: New 2010 rs website fully designed and ready to setup for your rsps!
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]First off, you used HTML.
Real RuneScape uses PHP to load the images.
Second off, you didn’t even remove JaGeX’s links.

All you did was Right Click > View Source > Save As… > “index.html”

1/10.[/quote]

Why would i want to remove Jagex’s links?
i did most of the work, i edited all the errors, AND i had to make this myself. maybe you could download it and look at it yourself. HTML isnt hard to edit. ESPECIALLY when it comes to internet linking, and such. just remove the links that arent neccesary.
2ndly, HOW WOULD I SAVE IT AS INDEX.HTML!?!?
You have to recreate the fucking page. with website templates, AND not only that. but the templates had many errors pn it, and i think i deserve more than 1/10.

Read full topic

item.title: New 2010 rs website fully designed and ready to setup for your rsps!
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

[quote=“plompke, post:6, topic:348423”][quote author=WaleedScape link=topic=444803.msg3265861#msg3265861 date=1278864807]
Trust me mate, it wasnt. i had to make a template from scratch in index.html and others and code it from there. the errors made it harder. Coding it was hard, but i made it look like the real runescape site. You can edit it if you like.
[/quote]well , ive opend the index.html , and it got me to your coded site? 0.0 that looked awsome.
but then , i clicked play … and i made an account , and it logged me on into real rs 0.0

but still nice jb man :)[/quote]
thanks. and u have to change links because all the links on it lead to rs
